message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12000. Considering its value and the time we've spent discussing it, I would like to offer it to you for $15000. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe that's a fair price considering the features and quality you mentioned earlier.
